Effects.Default.Creature.ObliterateAllNe: All animals within range of the player explode in a fiery ball of death.
Effects.Default.Misc.QuakeProFOV.Title: Quake Pro FOV
Effects.Default.Misc.QuakeProFOV.Descrip: Increases the Field of View to eye-watering levels.
Effects.Default.Misc.ZoomZoomCam.Title: Zoom Zoom Cam
Effects.Default.Misc.ZoomZoomCam.Descrip: Makes the camera zoom in and out, continuously.
Effects.Default.Meta.NoChaos.Title: No Chaos
Effects.Default.Meta.NoChaos.Description: Disables all other effects, while No Chaos is active.
Effects.Default.Misc.WhatAustraliaLooksL: Is This What Australia Looks Like?
Effects.Default.Player.Player.Title: #Yeet
Effects.Default.Player.Player.Descriptio: Launch the player into the stratosphere.
Effects.Default.Creature.YeetAllNearbyCr: Launch all animals within range, into space.
Effects.Default.Creature.ReviveAllNearby: Any corpses within range of the player are revived, with full health. Ready for Round 2?
Effects.Default.Player.Yeet.Title: #yeet
Effects.Default.Shader.AcidTrip.Title: Acid Trip
Effects.Default.Shader.AcidTrip.Descript: "Life is only a dream, and we are the imaginations of ourselves!" - Bill Hicks.
Effects.Default.Shader.CatsEyes.Title: Cats Eyes
Effects.Default.Shader.CatsEyes.Descript: Gives the player sepia vision in the dark.
Effects.Default.Shader.NightVision.Title: Night Vision
